mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 bankBill.FSerialNumber AS easSerialNumber, bankBill.FSourceBillId AS easBillNumber, bill.FNumber AS billNumber FROM T_BE_BankPayingBill bankBill(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CAS_PaymentBill bill(NOLOCK) ON bankBill.FSourceBillId = bill.FID WHERE bankBill.FSerialNumber = #{easSerialNumnber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
